definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]

sentences.english: Cats and snakes are traditionally cooked together (in the south only), given the name "dragon tiger fight".
sentences.chinese: 猫和蛇通常一起做，名字叫“龙虎斗”。

sentences.english: What is the Battle Between the Dragon and the Tiger?
sentences.chinese: 龙虎斗是一道什么样的菜？

sentences.english: The most famous dish, Dragon and Tiger Fight, is a dish of braised snake and leopard.
sentences.chinese: 粤菜里最有名是“龙虎斗”，也就是炖蛇肉和豹肉。

sentences.english: The brewing method of fight between dragon and tiger tea is also very special.
sentences.chinese: 纳西族喝的“龙虎斗”，制作方法也很奇特。

definition: lit. the dragon wars, the tiger battles (idiom); fierce battle between giants
two tigers fighting (idiom); fierce contest between evenly matched adversaries
see 棋逢對手|棋逢对手[qi2 feng2 dui4 shou3]
two tigers fight (idiom); fig. a dispute between two powerful adversaries/a battle of the giants
the dragon and phoenix are symbols of good fortune (idiom)/auspicious/decorated with auspicious symbols such as the dragon and the phoenix
clash that leaves both sides shattered
to commit suicide/to have one's life cut short
lit. sandpiper and clam war together (and the fisherman catches both) (idiom); fig. neighbors who can't agree lose out to a third party
to vie against one another/to fight each other/mutual aggression
